official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to repair and resurface a segment of the Foothills Parkway in Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to repair a specified segment of the Foothills Parkway in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee.
